arts.ttl: Daniel Farke explains Leeds United transfer strategy to German media – Awakening a sleeping giant
arts.sum: Leeds United are in firm contention to secure promotion to the Premier League after missing out last season. The Whites finished third and lost to Southampton in the play-off final last season. They are currently leading the Championship table with 72 points, four points ahead of third placed Burnley with a game in hand. Leeds The post Daniel Farke explains Leeds United transfer strategy to German media – Awakening a sleeping giant appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Ampadu faces surgery in blow for Wales and Leeds
arts.sum: Leeds boss Daniel Farke expects Ethan Ampadu to undergo knee surgery, making him a major doubt for the start of Wales' World Cup qualifying campaign at the end of March.

arts.ttl: ‘Can’t wait’ – Sheffield United man shares latest injury update
arts.sum: Sheffield United midfielder Oli Arblaster has said he ‘can’t wait’ to return from injury. Sheffield United have been… The post ‘Can’t wait’ – Sheffield United man shares latest injury update appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Leeds United to assess 24-year-old after Sheffield United squad omission
arts.sum: Leeds United will assess Ethan Ampadu after he was left out against Sheffield United, as detailed in a… The post Leeds United to assess 24-year-old after Sheffield United squad omission appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United 1-3 Leeds United: Daniel Farke revels in Yorkshire derby triumph in Championship
arts.sum: Leeds United head coach Daniel Farke has acknowledged that he was "a bit angry" with his side before they fought back to record a 3-1 victory over Championship title rivals Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Farke: Leeds deserved 'perfect' win at Sheff Utd but must stay grounded
arts.sum: Daniel Farke stressed "it's just three points" as his Leeds side came from behind to beat Sheffield United 3-1 and extend their Championship lead to five points.

arts.ttl: Leeds United sent Illan Meslier verdict after first-half Sheffield United 'disaster'
arts.sum: Leeds United goalkeeper Illan Meslier wouldn’t have made the mistake that led to Sheffield United’s opening goal had he not ‘spiralled’ from two mistakes just a couple of minutes earlier. “ Joe Rodon will probably be disappointed that he’s lost his man, I don’t think he’s seen him, when you see his reaction it’s as if he doesn’t know he’s behind him, but could Leeds get a bit of pressure on the ball to stop it coming in?

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings as Firpo and Solomon star in Sheffield United win
arts.sum: Daniel James lofted a cross over to Junior Firpo, who headed home his second goal of the season on 72 minutes. The visitors went behind after 14 minutes when Illan Meslier inadvertently palmed the ball into his net.

arts.ttl: Tanaka sends Leeds five points clear in dramatic late win over Sheffield United
arts.sum: The night Leeds United’s season swung decisively, or just another evening in the most unpredictable league in football? Only in May will we know that answer for sure, but the scale of the celebrations from those associated with Leeds here perhaps told you everything you need to know. The popular song aimed in Leeds’ direction when things are going wrong is to decry that Daniel Farke’s side are falling apart. But here, when it mattered most, this team showed that they are anything but one that capitulates in the crucial moments. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Late Leeds double earns vital victory over Sheff Utd to move five points clear
arts.sum: An Illan Meslier’s own goal gave the hosts the lead, but Junior Firpo levelled in the 72nd minute before Ao Tanaka and Joel Piroe’s last-gasp salvo.
